pageContext.claim: “The dossier was written by a discredited foreign agent, who quote desperate that Donald Trump not get elected and was passionate about him.”
pageContext.analysis: At the time Christopher Steele was hired to write the dossier, he was a respected former British spy who had worked before with the FBI on other matters. The IG report said: "He [Steele] stated if anything he was 'favourably disposed' toward the Trump family before he began his research because he had visited a Trump family member at Trump Tower and 'been friendly' with that person for some years." That person turned out to be Ivanka Trump.
